description: Extract 2D image files from a 3D AFNI dataset.

verbose.title: Verbose flag
verbose.description: Print out verbose information during the run

nsize.title: N-size flag
nsize.description: Adjust size of 2D data file to be NxN, by padding with zeros, where N is a power of 2.

raw.title: Raw format flag
raw.description: Write images in 'raw' format (just the data bytes). There will be no header information saying what the image dimensions are.

float.title: Float format flag
float.description: Write images as floats, no matter what they are in the dataset itself.

zfirst.title: First Z slice
zfirst.description: Set 'num' = number of first z slice to be extracted (default = 1).

zlast.title: Last Z slice
zlast.description: Set 'num' = number of last z slice to be extracted (default = largest).

tfirst.title: First time slice
tfirst.description: Set 'num' = number of first time slice to be extracted (default = 1).

tlast.title: Last time slice
tlast.description: Set 'num' = number of last time slice to be extracted (default = largest).
